changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Reinit MRN search keywords -- delete old incorrect keywords
changeSet.sql: delete from os_search_entity_keywords where entity = 'collection_protocol_registration' and name = 'medicalRecordNumber'

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Reinit MRN search keywords -- add correct keywords
changeSet.sql: insert into os_search_entity_keywords(identifier, entity, entity_id, name, value, status) select os_search_entity_keywords_seq.nextval, 'collection_protocol_registration', r.identifier, 'medicalRecordNumber', lower(pmi.medical_record_number), 1 from catissue_part_medical_id pmi inner join catissue_participant p on p.identifier = pmi.participant_id inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg r on r.participant_id = p.identifier where p.activity_status != 'Disabled' and r.activity_status != 'Disabled' and pmi.medical_record_number is not null;
